directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Combine 1 cup water and 1/4 cup quick-cooking oats together in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on full power until mixture is thick and creamy, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.
Mix oatmeal, flour, milk, vegetable oil, and salt together in a bowl. Spread evenly on a baking sheet; top with bits of butter.
Bake in the preheated oven until brown on top, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste
title: Easydoesit Oatmeal Flatbread
